Open the "Phone" application from the home screen.
Open the Contacts app, displaying the contact list and navigation menu.
Click on "Device" to view contacts stored on the device.
Click the "+" button to create a new contact.
Click the "Last name" field to input the contact's last name.
Click the dropdown icon next to "First name" to reveal the "Name prefix" field.
Type "Contact" into the "First name" field.
Click "OK" to dismiss the "Add info to save as a contact" dialog.
